00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOG
00038 
00039 #include <obd_class.h>
00040 #include <lustre_ioctl.h>
00041 #include <lustre_log.h>
00042 #include "llog_internal.h"
00043 
00044 static int str2logid(struct llog_logid *logid, char *str, int len)
00045 {
00046         char *start, *end, *endp;
00047         __u64 id, seq;
00048 
00049         ENTRY;
00050         start = str;
00051         if (*start != '#')
00052                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00053 
00054         start++;
00055         if (start - str >= len - 1)
00056                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00057         end = strchr(start, '#');
00058         if (end == NULL || end == start)
00059                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00060 
00061         *end = '\0';
00062         id = simple_strtoull(start, &endp, 0);
00063         if (endp != end)
00064                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00065 
00066         start = ++end;
00067         if (start - str >= len - 1)
00068                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00069         end = strchr(start, '#');
00070         if (end == NULL || end == start)
00071                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00072 
00073         *end = '\0';
00074         seq = simple_strtoull(start, &endp, 0);
00075         if (endp != end)
00076                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00077 
00078         ostid_set_seq(&logid->lgl_oi, seq);
00079         ostid_set_id(&logid->lgl_oi, id);
00080 
00081         start = ++end;
00082         if (start - str >= len - 1)
00083                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00084         logid->lgl_ogen = simple_strtoul(start, &endp, 16);
00085         if (*endp != '\0')
00086                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00087 
00088         RETURN(0);
00089 }
00090 
00091 static int llog_check_cb(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_handle *handle,
00092                          struct llog_rec_hdr *rec, void *data)
00093 {
00094         struct obd_ioctl_data *ioc_data = (struct obd_ioctl_data *)data;
00095         static int l, remains;
00096         static long from, to;
00097         static char *out;
00098         char *endp;
00099         int cur_index, rc = 0;
00100 
00101         ENTRY;
00102 
00103         if (ioc_data && ioc_data->ioc_inllen1 > 0) {
00104                 l = 0;
00105                 remains = ioc_data->ioc_inllen4 +
00106                         cfs_size_round(ioc_data->ioc_inllen1) +
00107                         cfs_size_round(ioc_data->ioc_inllen2) +
00108                         cfs_size_round(ioc_data->ioc_inllen3);
00109                 from = simple_strtol(ioc_data->ioc_inlbuf2, &endp, 0);
00110                 if (*endp != '\0')
00111                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00112                 to = simple_strtol(ioc_data->ioc_inlbuf3, &endp, 0);
00113                 if (*endp != '\0')
00114                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00115                 ioc_data->ioc_inllen1 = 0;
00116                 out = ioc_data->ioc_bulk;
00117         }
00118 
00119         cur_index = rec->lrh_index;
00120         if (cur_index < from)
00121                 RETURN(0);
00122         if (to > 0 && cur_index > to)
00123                 RETURN(-LLOG_EEMPTY);
00124 
00125         if (handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT) {
00126                 struct llog_logid_rec   *lir = (struct llog_logid_rec *)rec;
00127                 struct llog_handle      *loghandle;
00128 
00129                 if (rec->lrh_type != LLOG_LOGID_MAGIC) {
00130                         l = snprintf(out, remains, "[index]: %05d  [type]: "
00131                                      "%02x  [len]: %04d failed\n",
00132                                      cur_index, rec->lrh_type,
00133                                      rec->lrh_len);
00134                 }
00135                 if (handle->lgh_ctxt == NULL)
00136                         RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
00137                 rc = llog_cat_id2handle(env, handle, &loghandle, &lir->lid_id);
00138                 if (rc) {
00139                         CDEBUG(D_IOCTL, "cannot find log #"DOSTID"#%08x\n",
00140                                POSTID(&lir->lid_id.lgl_oi),
00141                                lir->lid_id.lgl_ogen);
00142                         RETURN(rc);
00143                 }
00144                 rc = llog_process(env, loghandle, llog_check_cb, NULL, NULL);
00145                 llog_handle_put(loghandle);
00146         } else {
00147                 bool ok;
00148 
00149                 switch (rec->lrh_type) {
00150                 case OST_SZ_REC:
00151                 case MDS_UNLINK_REC:
00152                 case MDS_UNLINK64_REC:
00153                 case MDS_SETATTR64_REC:
00154                 case OBD_CFG_REC:
00155                 case LLOG_GEN_REC:
00156                 case LLOG_HDR_MAGIC:
00157                         ok = true;
00158                         break;
00159                 default:
00160                         ok = false;
00161                 }
00162 
00163                 l = snprintf(out, remains, "[index]: %05d  [type]: "
00164                              "%02x  [len]: %04d %s\n",
00165                              cur_index, rec->lrh_type, rec->lrh_len,
00166                              ok ? "ok" : "failed");
00167                 out += l;
00168                 remains -= l;
00169                 if (remains <= 0) {
00170                         CERROR("%s: no space to print log records\n",
00171                                handle->lgh_ctxt->loc_obd->obd_name);
00172                         RETURN(-LLOG_EEMPTY);
00173                 }
00174         }
00175         RETURN(rc);
00176 }
00177 
00178 static int llog_print_cb(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_handle *handle,
00179                          struct llog_rec_hdr *rec, void *data)
00180 {
00181         struct obd_ioctl_data *ioc_data = (struct obd_ioctl_data *)data;
00182         static int l, remains;
00183         static long from, to;
00184         static char *out;
00185         char *endp;
00186         int cur_index;
00187 
00188         ENTRY;
00189         if (ioc_data != NULL && ioc_data->ioc_inllen1 > 0) {
00190                 l = 0;
00191                 remains = ioc_data->ioc_inllen4 +
00192                         cfs_size_round(ioc_data->ioc_inllen1) +
00193                         cfs_size_round(ioc_data->ioc_inllen2) +
00194                         cfs_size_round(ioc_data->ioc_inllen3);
00195                 from = simple_strtol(ioc_data->ioc_inlbuf2, &endp, 0);
00196                 if (*endp != '\0')
00197                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00198                 to = simple_strtol(ioc_data->ioc_inlbuf3, &endp, 0);
00199                 if (*endp != '\0')
00200                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00201                 out = ioc_data->ioc_bulk;
00202                 ioc_data->ioc_inllen1 = 0;
00203         }
00204 
00205         cur_index = rec->lrh_index;
00206         if (cur_index < from)
00207                 RETURN(0);
00208         if (to > 0 && cur_index > to)
00209                 RETURN(-LLOG_EEMPTY);
00210 
00211         if (handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT) {
00212                 struct llog_logid_rec *lir = (struct llog_logid_rec *)rec;
00213 
00214                 if (rec->lrh_type != LLOG_LOGID_MAGIC) {
00215                         CERROR("invalid record in catalog\n");
00216                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00217                 }
00218 
00219                 l = snprintf(out, remains,
00220                              "[index]: %05d  [logid]: #"DOSTID"#%08x\n",
00221                              cur_index, POSTID(&lir->lid_id.lgl_oi),
00222                              lir->lid_id.lgl_ogen);
00223         } else if (rec->lrh_type == OBD_CFG_REC) {
00224                 int rc;
00225 
00226                 rc = class_config_yaml_output(rec, out, remains);
00227                 if (rc < 0)
00228                         RETURN(rc);
00229                 l = rc;
00230         } else {
00231                 l = snprintf(out, remains,
00232                              "[index]: %05d  [type]: %02x  [len]: %04d\n",
00233                              cur_index, rec->lrh_type, rec->lrh_len);
00234         }
00235         out += l;
00236         remains -= l;
00237         if (remains <= 0) {
00238                 CERROR("not enough space for print log records\n");
00239                 RETURN(-LLOG_EEMPTY);
00240         }
00241 
00242         RETURN(0);
00243 }
00244 static int llog_remove_log(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_handle *cat,
00245                            struct llog_logid *logid)
00246 {
00247         struct llog_handle      *log;
00248         int                      rc;
00249 
00250         ENTRY;
00251 
00252         rc = llog_cat_id2handle(env, cat, &log, logid);
00253         if (rc) {
00254                 CDEBUG(D_IOCTL, "cannot find log #"DOSTID"#%08x\n",
00255                        POSTID(&logid->lgl_oi), logid->lgl_ogen);
00256                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00257         }
00258 
00259         rc = llog_destroy(env, log);
00260         if (rc) {
00261                 CDEBUG(D_IOCTL, "cannot destroy log\n");
00262                 GOTO(out, rc);
00263         }
00264         llog_cat_cleanup(env, cat, log, log->u.phd.phd_cookie.lgc_index);
00265 out:
00266         llog_handle_put(log);
00267         RETURN(rc);
00268 
00269 }
00270 
00271 static int llog_delete_cb(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_handle *handle,
00272                           struct llog_rec_hdr *rec, void *data)
00273 {
00274         struct llog_logid_rec   *lir = (struct llog_logid_rec *)rec;
00275         int                      rc;
00276 
00277         ENTRY;
00278         if (rec->lrh_type != LLOG_LOGID_MAGIC)
00279                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00280         rc = llog_remove_log(env, handle, &lir->lid_id);
00281 
00282         RETURN(rc);
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00286 int llog_ioctl(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_ctxt *ctxt, int cmd,
00287                struct obd_ioctl_data *data)
00288 {
00289         struct llog_logid        logid;
00290         int                      rc = 0;
00291         struct llog_handle      *handle = NULL;
00292 
00293         ENTRY;
00294 
00295         if (*data->ioc_inlbuf1 == '#') {
00296                 rc = str2logid(&logid, data->ioc_inlbuf1, data->ioc_inllen1);
00297                 if (rc)
00298                         RETURN(rc);
00299                 rc = llog_open(env, ctxt, &handle, &logid, NULL,
00300                                LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
00301                 if (rc)
00302                         RETURN(rc);
00303         } else if (*data->ioc_inlbuf1 == '$') {
00304                 char *name = data->ioc_inlbuf1 + 1;
00305 
00306                 rc = llog_open(env, ctxt, &handle, NULL, name,
00307                                LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
00308                 if (rc)
00309                         RETURN(rc);
00310         } else {
00311                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00312         }
00313 
00314         rc = llog_init_handle(env, handle, 0, NULL);
00315         if (rc)
00316                 GOTO(out_close, rc = -ENOENT);
00317 
00318         switch (cmd) {
00319         case OBD_IOC_LLOG_INFO: {
00320                 int      l;
00321                 int      remains = data->ioc_inllen2 +
00322                                    cfs_size_round(data->ioc_inllen1);
00323                 char    *out = data->ioc_bulk;
00324 
00325                 l = snprintf(out, remains,
00326                              "logid:            #"DOSTID"#%08x\n"
00327                              "flags:            %x (%s)\n"
00328                              "records count:    %d\n"
00329                              "last index:       %d\n",
00330                              POSTID(&handle->lgh_id.lgl_oi),
00331                              handle->lgh_id.lgl_ogen,
00332                              handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags,
00333                              handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags &
00334                              LLOG_F_IS_CAT ? "cat" : "plain",
00335                              handle->lgh_hdr->llh_count,
00336                              handle->lgh_last_idx);
00337                 out += l;
00338                 remains -= l;
00339                 if (remains <= 0) {
00340                         CERROR("%s: not enough space for log header info\n",
00341                                ctxt->loc_obd->obd_name);
00342                         rc = -ENOSPC;
00343                 }
00344                 break;
00345         }
00346         case OBD_IOC_LLOG_CHECK:
00347                 LASSERT(data->ioc_inllen1 > 0);
00348                 rc = llog_process(env, handle, llog_check_cb, data, NULL);
00349                 if (rc == -LLOG_EEMPTY)
00350                         rc = 0;
00351                 else if (rc)
00352                         GOTO(out_close, rc);
00353                 break;
00354         case OBD_IOC_LLOG_PRINT:
00355                 LASSERT(data->ioc_inllen1 > 0);
00356                 rc = llog_process(env, handle, llog_print_cb, data, NULL);
00357                 if (rc == -LLOG_EEMPTY)
00358                         rc = 0;
00359                 else if (rc)
00360                         GOTO(out_close, rc);
00361                 break;
00362         case OBD_IOC_LLOG_CANCEL: {
00363                 struct llog_cookie cookie;
00364                 struct llog_logid plain;
00365                 char *endp;
00366 
00367                 cookie.lgc_index = simple_strtoul(data->ioc_inlbuf3, &endp, 0);
00368                 if (*endp != '\0')
00369                         GOTO(out_close, rc = -EINVAL);
00370 
00371                 if (handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_PLAIN) {
00372                         rc = llog_cancel_rec(env, handle, cookie.lgc_index);
00373                         GOTO(out_close, rc);
00374                 } else if (!(handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT)) {
00375                         GOTO(out_close, rc = -EINVAL);
00376                 }
00377 
00378                 if (data->ioc_inlbuf2 == NULL) /* catalog but no logid */
00379                         GOTO(out_close, rc = -ENOTTY);
00380 
00381                 rc = str2logid(&plain, data->ioc_inlbuf2, data->ioc_inllen2);
00382                 if (rc)
00383                         GOTO(out_close, rc);
00384                 cookie.lgc_lgl = plain;
00385                 rc = llog_cat_cancel_records(env, handle, 1, &cookie);
00386                 if (rc)
00387                         GOTO(out_close, rc);
00388                 break;
00389         }
00390         case OBD_IOC_LLOG_REMOVE: {
00391                 struct llog_logid plain;
00392 
00393                 if (handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_PLAIN) {
00394                         rc = llog_destroy(env, handle);
00395                         GOTO(out_close, rc);
00396                 } else if (!(handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT)) {
00397                         GOTO(out_close, rc = -EINVAL);
00398                 }
00399 
00400                 if (data->ioc_inlbuf2 > 0) {
00401                         /* remove indicate log from the catalog */
00402                         rc = str2logid(&plain, data->ioc_inlbuf2,
00403                                        data->ioc_inllen2);
00404                         if (rc)
00405                                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00406                         rc = llog_remove_log(env, handle, &plain);
00407                 } else {
00408                         /* remove all the log of the catalog */
00409                         rc = llog_process(env, handle, llog_delete_cb, NULL,
00410                                           NULL);
00411                         if (rc)
00412                                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00413                 }
00414                 break;
00415         }
00416         default:
00417                 CERROR("%s: Unknown ioctl cmd %#x\n",
00418                        ctxt->loc_obd->obd_name, cmd);
00419                 GOTO(out_close, rc = -ENOTTY);
00420         }
00421 
00422 out_close:
00423         if (handle->lgh_hdr &&
00424             handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT)
00425                 llog_cat_close(env, handle);
00426         else
00427                 llog_close(env, handle);
00428         RETURN(rc);
00429 }
00430 EXPORT_SYMBOL(llog_ioctl);
00431 
00432 int llog_catalog_list(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *d,
00433                       int count, struct obd_ioctl_data *data,
00434                       const struct lu_fid *fid)
00435 {
00436         int                      size, i;
00437         struct llog_catid       *idarray;
00438         struct llog_logid       *id;
00439         char                    *out;
00440         int                      l, remains, rc = 0;
00441 
00442         ENTRY;
00443 
00444         if (count == 0) { /* get total number of logs */
00445                 rc = llog_osd_get_cat_list(env, d, 0, 0, NULL, fid);
00446                 if (rc < 0)
00447                         RETURN(rc);
00448                 count = rc;
00449         }
00450 
00451         size = sizeof(*idarray) * count;
00452 
00453         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(idarray, size);
00454         if (!idarray)
00455                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00456 
00457         rc = llog_osd_get_cat_list(env, d, 0, count, idarray, fid);
00458         if (rc)
00459                 GOTO(out, rc);
00460 
00461         out = data->ioc_bulk;
00462         remains = data->ioc_inllen1;
00463         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00464                 id = &idarray[i].lci_logid;
00465                 l = snprintf(out, remains,
00466                              "catalog log: #"DOSTID"#%08x\n",
00467                              POSTID(&id->lgl_oi),
00468                              id->lgl_ogen);
00469                 out += l;
00470                 remains -= l;
00471                 if (remains <= 0)
00472                         break;
00473         }
00474 out:
00475         OBD_FREE_LARGE(idarray, size);
00476         RETURN(rc);
00477 }
00478 EXPORT_SYMBOL(llog_catalog_list);
